name: Assignment 5 - Unity Lighting
description:
Instructions

Please create a night scene using the provided fbx file.

Lighting Assets

  • Drag in the Standard Assets folder and the Free HDR Sky folder
  • Drag in a first or 3rd person controller to the scene.
  • Make sure to add colliders to the meshes.
  • Bake lights in the bar scene.  Attached image for reference. Should have lighting throughout the entire interior. 
  • Hallways/outdoor area should have visual cues for telling the player where to go using light. 
  • Use baked emission light in multiple areas somewhere in your scene(be creative)
  • Add additional unity Game objects>3d objects to the scene>bake the lighting 
  • Add HDR skymap in lighting settings Search for free HDR in asset store
  • Submit to itch.io 
  • BE CREATIVE WITH YOUR LIGHTING!
